message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $20000. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. Let me know what you think!
That's a bit out of my budget, I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand it's a significant investment.  I'm willing to come down to $18000. This reflects the value of the product and allows us both to walk away happy. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16000. Can you meet me there?
